alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Kennebec; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 12:26PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southwestern Kennebec... Androscoggin and northwestern Sagadahoc Counties... At 1225 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was over Turner... moving southeast AT 25 MPH. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Auburn, Gardiner, Turner, Topsham, Litchfield, Livermore Falls, Farmingdale, Manchester, Winthrop, Lisbon, Greene, Durham, Bowdoin, Bowdoinham, Leeds, Livermore, Wales, Sabattus, and Monmouth. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 38 and 51. Interstate 95 between mile markers 78 and 103. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. * Sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
